Text: My Friend, You post the most extraordinary music I have ever seen.I can't imagine where you get these albums.I have been collecting Blues music for over 35 years and you Post many I have never heard.Are these from vinyl or cd or what? Thanks for taking the time to share these.
You have really a superb blues collection. Thanks for sharing.
Thanks heaps, i've been listening to the blues for 40yrs you have by far the best blues collection i've come across, thanks for sharing mate

And I've been playing blues for over forty years.

You are welcome, bro.   Thanks for all your kind comments recently. 

Regards, nightissuchproximity

And DITTO from me too Night ~ AMAZING MUSIC !!! some/most of which I play/Stream Live to air Friday's 2-4pm at www.blufm.org.au on the Touchwoodblues Show, been bluesing since I was 11, and just LOVE this INCREDIBLE music you U/p ~ Thank You, is not enuff ~ Wbg
